content: A simple and concise guide for new traders help those traders to achieve their trading goals. 1. Start trading with a "Trading plan"A trading plan is a very important step for a trader. A trading plan is a proper way to plan your trading goals by making proper steps that could allow you to earn profits from your trading activates. It's necessary to make a proper trading plan by writing your investment goals and desired returns of the investment as well as a timeline to achieve those goals. Without a proper and working trading plan one can never earn enough profits from trading and the chance of loss is also higher for such person.2. Educate yourself about tradingA good trader always tries to learn about trading from various sources that include books, online courses, and other available stuff present on the internet. the traders who have no knowledge about trading are prone to face huge losses in trading and that's why it's better to learn about trading and its concepts as a first step before doing any actual trades.3. Start smallIt's necessary to get familiar with trading process, and that can be done with very little amount of money in beginning. The traders who begin their trading journey with a little amount of money will always have higher advantage over the ones who begin with huge sums of money because the prior ones won't get impacted by lost trades as much as the later ones.4. Invest what you can afford to loseMany traders start trading by investing a lot of money into it, and they don't know that in trading one can also face losses sometimes. When those traders lose that money then they think that why they have invested that much into trading. A good trader only invest the amount of money into trading that he/she can afford to lose, and investing is more than that is unnecessary. 5. Diversify your portfolio: Someone who diversify his/her portfolio can reduce the risk of loss to huge extents. A good trader often diversify his portfolio by investing in various class of assets because a single asset in a single market can sometimes be a cause for huge losses and that's why a good trader should diversify his/her portfolio.6. Use stop-loss ordersWhen you are investing in a market then it's important to use risk management tools such as stop-loss to limit your potential losses. A stop-loss order is an order placed with a broker to sell a security when it reaches a predetermined price, designed to prevent significant losses by automatically closing out your position.7. PracticeTo become a successful trader one need to do trading practice on daily basis because a trader always has to learn and master new things and those require practicing. A trader who give proper time to practicing his/her trading skills often gets higher advantages during real time trading. A trader doesn't always need to have real money to begin practicing trading because such trader can begin with a demo account, and he/she can improve his/her trading skills by practicing with virtual money.

Ten times or twenty times or more, I don't know, it's personal issue but I am sure it is not easy to be a successful trader.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: The reason most traders fail is that they lack a trading plan, and the few that have the plan might not have the correct one that will be foolproof and withstand the test of time. Trading is risky, tricky and confusing, even those that have the trading plan still might be confused and discouraged over time. But if the trader's plan is good, it will always withstand the test of time.However, the priority of the plan of any trader should be a very good trading strategy and money/risk management. And if the trader could tame his emotion, success will linger.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Your first point, beginning trading with a "trading plan," is the most important step in trading successfully. Without a plan, your trading journey may end in disappointment, with you exiting the market as soon as you began trading and accumulating more loss than profit. If the first step is not taken into account, every other step you take in trading will fail. Without a trading plan, it's as if you're not constructing a solid foundation in trading; it will undoubtedly crumble within a short period of time.Investing what you can afford to lose is critical for any trader because it is the only way to stay in the market when the market is volatile. If you can overcome this, the risk of disappointment and heartbreak will be greatly reduced, and your trading experience will be improved.
